‚úÖ Create 2,078 units of housing for the disabled

‚úÖ Increase access to Head Start for 36,000 low-income children

Recognizing the detrimental impact of the #TrumpShutdown on federal employees and families, I‚Äôve decided to make one of my first acts as a representative to cosponsor @RepDonBeyer‚Äôs bill on retroactive pay for federal employees affected by the closing of the federal government.
